00001 <?php
00007 require_once('.../extensions/DataAPI/PageCRUD_Plus/PCP.php');  
00008 require_once('.../extensions/DataAPI/PageObjectModel/POM.php');
00009 
00010 // create the target system object
00011 $__smwSystem = new PCPWikiSystem("http://localhost/smw");
00012 
00013 // create the user credentials object  
00014 $__userCredentials = new PCPUserCredentials(
00015                 "user", # the username
00016                 "pass" # the password
00017                 );
00018 
00019 // create the PCP client object 
00020 $__client = new PCPClient($__userCredentials, $__smwSystem);
00021 
00022 // retrieve login token and user ID
00023 // NOTE: the user must have the required rights in order to read / update the page
00024 $__userCredentials = $__client->login(); 
00025                 
00026 // create the page object from PCP
00027 $__page = $__client->readPage(
00028                 $__userCredentials,
00029                 "testpage");
00030 
00031 // now create the POM of the page
00032 $__pom = new POMPage(
00033                 $__page->title,
00034                 $__page->text
00035                 );
00036 
00037 // create an iterator for the page templates 
00038 $__iterator = $__pom->getTemplateByTitle("Testtemplate")->listIterator();
00039 
00040 // since we expect only one instance defined we won't iterate but just get the first instance
00041 $__template = &$__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference(); # get reference for direct changes
00042 
00043 if($__template->getParameter("Testparameter")!== NULL){ # does the parameter exist?
00044         $__paramValue = &$__template->getParameterValue("Testparameter"); # reference for the value
00045         $__paramValue = POMProperty::createProperty("has Testproperty", "a testproperty instance"); # the new parameter value is created
00046 }
00047 // sync the POM with the source text, i.e. the POM is translated into text
00048 $__pom->sync();
00049 
00050 // now write back the changes
00051 $__client->updatePage(
00052                 $__userCredentials,
00053                 $__page->title,
00054                 $__pom->text
00055                 );
00056 ?>
